title: Intermittent in-game latency spikes/disconnects.
body: Unless my ISP is specifically hating League of Legends. This is only a problem with League of Legends. All other online games are fine. Happens every 30-200 seconds

replies.body:
Woo, this is new. I have power-cycled modem, and router again.  Running a few games now to see if anything happens. 

EDIT: Might have worked, I've ran some troubleshooting before the post. But those didn't work. Seems okay now, I suppose it needed more motivation than usual. 

http://imgur.com/sKAKpLD

Your ISP could have changed how it routes to the game server but there could be other issues that's causing you problems like packet loss here.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader)  for these matches, specifically the ones where they are spiking suddenly.  Let me know what you find!
